00032 class AmazonSQS extends TarzanCore

00041         {
00042                 $this->api_version = '2008-01-01';
00043                 parent::__construct($key, $secret_key, $account_id, $assoc_id);

00064         public function create_queue($queue_name, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00065         {
00066                 $opt['QueueName'] = $queue_name;
00067                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00068                 return $this->authenticate('CreateQueue', $opt, SQS_DEFAULT_URL);
00069         }
00070 
00085         public function delete_queue($queue_url, $force_deletion = false, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00086         {
00087                 $opt = array();
00088                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00089                 if ($force_deletion)
00090                 {
00091                         $opt['ForceDeletion'] = (string) $force_deletion;
00092                 }
00093                 return $this->authenticate('DeleteQueue', $opt, $queue_url);
00094         }
00095 
00109         public function list_queues($queue_name_prefix = null, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00110         {
00111                 $opt = array();
00112                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00113                 if ($queue_name_prefix)
00114                 {
00115                         $opt['QueueNamePrefix'] = $queue_name_prefix;
00116                 }
00117                 return $this->authenticate('ListQueues', $opt, SQS_DEFAULT_URL);
00118         }
00119 
00131         public function get_queue_attributes($queue_url, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00132         {
00133                 $opt = array();
00134                 $opt['AttributeName'] = 'All';
00135                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00136                 return $this->authenticate('GetQueueAttributes', $opt, $queue_url);
00137         }

00225         public function delete_message($queue_url, $receipt_handle, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00226         {
00227                 $opt = array();
00228                 $opt['ReceiptHandle'] = $receipt_handle;
00229                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00230                 return $this->authenticate('DeleteMessage', $opt, $queue_url);

00246         public function get_queue_size($queue_url)
00247         {
00248                 $opt = array();
00249                 $opt['AttributeName'] = 'ApproximateNumberOfMessages';
00250                 $response = $this->authenticate('GetQueueAttributes', $opt, $queue_url);
00251                 return (integer) $response->body->GetQueueAttributesResult->Attribute->Value;
00252         }
